channel.title: CML on Blog of Kai
channel.description: Recent content in CML on Blog of Kai

item.title: Proper or messy allocation?--Systematic approach to identifying and solving multi-functionality in LCA
item.description: Avoided burden1 Most existing LCA databases today do not include multi-functional processes.

item.title: Waste is not a service
item.description: https://link.springer.com/content/pdf/10.1007/s11367-021-01955-5.pdf Almost every overview of LCA gives a graphical indication of the idea of a life cycle.

item.title: MSc Industrial Ecology programme
item.description: Industrial Ecology The MSc Industrial Ecology (joint degree Leiden University and TU Delft) is an interdisciplinary and international programme, which focuses on the analysis of sustainability problems and the design and implementation of solutions for these problems; all from a socio-technical system perspective.
